Package dataStructures.implementations

Class Network<T>

java.lang.Object
dataStructures.implementations.Graph<T>
dataStructures.implementations.Network<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the vertices in the network
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphADT<T>, NetworkADT<T>
public class Network<T> extends Graph<T> implements NetworkADT<T>
Represents a weighted undirected network.

    • shortestPathWeight

      public double shortestPathWeight(int startIndex, int targetIndex)
      Calculates the weight of the shortest path between two vertices specified by their indices.
      Parameters:
      startIndex - The index of the starting vertex.
      targetIndex - The index of the destination vertex.
      Returns:
      The total weight of the shortest path between the vertices, or Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if no path exists.
